title: Tomato cod with minted potato crush

ingredients.item: 260g pack 2 Waitrose Skinless, Boneless Cod Fillets
300g pack Waitrose Potato Crush With Grain Mustard (selected stores)

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C, gas mark 6.
Mix the cod and tomato paste together coating the fillets evenly. Place the cod on a small baking tray and roast for 15 minutes, or until just cooked through.

Meanwhile, cook the peas and broad beans in boiling water for 3 minutes. Drain and return to the pan. Crush gently with a potato masher. Heat the potato crush according to the pack instructions, and mix into the peas with the mint. Serve the cod with the minted potato crush.
